body_html: @lauphedo Well, in my case, I guess it is because problems with cuda installation. I was testing a code with the same image used in their demo. Then, I tried one of my old codes and the same error came out so it should be something else and not a memory issue. I hope I could solve this problem soon and report the solution.

body: @lauphedo  Well, in my case, I guess it is because problems with cuda installation. I was testing a code with the same image used in their demo. Then, I tried one of my old codes and the same error came out so it should be something else and not a memory issue. I hope I could solve this problem soon and report the solution.
